description: Spearheaded SDLC, Data Integration, and Software Engineering processes, overseeing the internal system architecture, including databases, and providing strategic technical consultation within a subsidiary of Indonesia’s largest state-owned energy company, Pertamina. Directed the seamless integration of our holding entity and its largest subsidiary, Gas Negara, into our company’s systems, collaborating closely with stakeholders and vendors to ensure solutions aligned with business objectives, met rigorous quality standards, and were built for scalability.

Experience in large-scale Agile projects: managed transactions for the nation’s leading modem provider using microservices; led the development of performance and pricing data features for Indonesia's largest pricing management system, servicing the country’s largest supermarket chains; developed transaction APIs for one of Indonesia's top banks; standardized OAuth2-secured APIs for a major learning management system supporting medical professionals.

Responsible for building and maintaining enterprise web apps: crafting secure, scalable back-end APIs for seamless data integration, developing intuitive front-end interfaces, and supporting QA/UAT for production-ready quality, while collaborating directly with users for precise requirement alignment.

Built and maintained HealingSolutions.id’s core brand, ensuring seamless execution of management’s business decisions. Led e-commerce development, managed social media accounts, and produced daily content in collaboration with cross-departmental teams.
Intern, involved in the development company profile website from scratch, and maintained The Web for Content Updates
